description.original: Style and customize codeblocks and inline code in both editing mode and reading mode.
description.translation: Style and customize codeblocks and inline code in both editing mode and reading mode.

dict.name: \"Reset fold state for all codeblo: name: "Reset fold state for all codeblocks"
dict.text: \"Settings for the Code Styler Plu: text: "Settings for the Code Styler Plugin."
dict.text: \"If you like this plugin, and wou: text: "If you like this plugin, and would like to help support continued development, use the button below!"
dict..setDesc(\"Change dropdown to modify dif: .setDesc("Change dropdown to modify different groups of settings"
dict..setDesc(\"Change dropdown to modify sty: .setDesc("Change dropdown to modify styles and settings of different codeblock sections"
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, styling will be a: .setDesc("If enabled, styling will be applied when exporting to PDF."
dict..setDesc(\"Create a new theme from the c: .setDesc("Create a new theme from the current settings."
dict..setDesc(\"Determines how rounded the co: .setDesc("Determines how rounded the codeblocks appear in pixels."
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, languages with ic: .setDesc("If enabled, languages with icons display a left border with the colour of the icon. The slider sets the width of the border."
dict..setDesc(\"Choose whether to unwrap line: .setDesc("Choose whether to unwrap lines in reading mode"
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, in reading mode,: .setDesc("If enabled, in reading mode, holding click on a codeblock will wrap the lines for better visibility."
dict..setDesc(\"If disabled, the below settin: .setDesc("If disabled, the below settings are disabled too."
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, highlights will a: .setDesc("If enabled, highlights will also highlight the line numbers."
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, the current line: .setDesc("If enabled, the current line number in codeblocks will be indicated with a separate colour."
dict..setDesc(\"Set the font size for header: .setDesc("Set the font size for header language tags and titles."
dict..setDesc(\"Style the header title text u: .setDesc("Style the header title text using bold and italic toggles, by setting a font or by setting a text colour."
dict..setDesc(\"Title placeholder text for fo: .setDesc("Title placeholder text for folded code when no title parameter is set."
dict..setDesc(\"Colour of the line separating: .setDesc("Colour of the line separating the codeblock header and the codeblock."
dict..setDesc('Determine when to show languag: .setDesc('Determine when to show language tags in the header. "Title Only" will only show language tags when the title parameter is set.'
.setDesc('Determine when to show language icons where available. "Title Only" will only show language tags when the title parameter is set.'
dict..setDesc(\"Style the header language tag: .setDesc("Style the header language tag text using bold and italic toggles, by setting a font or by setting a text colour."
dict..setDesc(\"If disabled, language icons w: .setDesc("If disabled, language icons will be black and white."
dict..setDesc(\"Set the size of the displayed: .setDesc("Set the size of the displayed language icons."
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, highlights the ac: .setDesc("If enabled, highlights the active line inside codeblocks."
dict..setDesc(\"Define a new alternative high: .setDesc("Define a new alternative highlight name. The colour can be modified after it is added."
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, highlights fade a: .setDesc("If enabled, highlights fade away to the right. The slider sets the gradient colour stop as a percentage."
dict..setDesc(\"Define languages in a comma s: .setDesc("Define languages in a comma separated list which the plugin should not decorate. You can use a wildcard (*) either at the beginning, or at the end. For example: ad-* will exclude codeblocks where the language starts with ad- e.g.: ad-info, ad-error etc."

.setDesc("Define languages in a comma separated list which the plugin should style despite being processed by another plugin. You can use a wildcard (*) either at the beginning, or at the end. For example: ad-* will exclude codeblocks where the language starts with ad- e.g.: ad-info, ad-error etc."
dict..setDesc(\"Use this textbox to redirect: .setDesc("Use this textbox to redirect specific language colours and icons as a JSON with language names as keys and either a colour key, an icon key or both as the value for a given language. Colours should be passed as CSS colours and icons should be passed as a string of the inside of an svg element. This setting is theme independent."
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, in reading mode,: .setDesc("If enabled, in reading mode, inline code will be syntax highlighted based on a language set with `{language} highlighted_inline_code`. See the README for more information."
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, inline code will: .setDesc("If enabled, inline code will be styled."
dict..setDesc(\"The text colour of inline cod: .setDesc("The text colour of inline code titles."
dict..setDesc(\"Determines how bold inline co: .setDesc("Determines how bold inline code titles appear."
dict..setDesc(\"The text colour when editing: .setDesc("The text colour when editing inline code."
dict..setDesc(\"Determines how rounded inline: .setDesc("Determines how rounded inline code appear in pixels."
dict..setDesc(\"Determines how much vertical: .setDesc("Determines how much vertical inner padding in pixels inline code has."
dict..setDesc(\"Determines how much horizonta: .setDesc("Determines how much horizontal inner padding in pixels inline code has."
.setDesc("Determines how much horizontal outer margin is added to the inline code in pixels."
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, highlights the ac: .setDesc("If enabled, highlights the active line outside codeblocks."
dict..setDesc(\"This will return all inbuilt: .setDesc("This will return all inbuilt themes to the plugin defaults"
dict..setDesc(\"Used for UI buttons like the: .setDesc("Used for UI buttons like the copy code button."
dict..setDesc(\"Parameters and language which: .setDesc("Parameters and language which would follow codeblock delimiter."
dict..setDesc(\"Text to render as example ins: .setDesc("Text to render as example inside code delimiters."
dict..setDesc(`To highlight lines with this h: .setDesc(`To highlight lines with this highlight, use the ${alternativeHighlightName} parameter.`
dict..setDesc(\"If enabled, external referenc: .setDesc("If enabled, external references will be updated automatically on load when possible.")
